A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Enjoyable\, but rather disappointing. I expected more. I loved The Force Awakens and Rogue One\, and therefore had high hopes for The last Jedi. Unfortunately the story was convoluted\, and I hated the subplot with Finn and Rose-it was pointless and their dialogue was often cheesy. The high points happened along Rey’s story\, and the bits of comedy added a nice levity. I hope for better with the last installment.
